title: Crypto Money Laundering Dropped 30% Last Year, Chainalysis Says
description: Illicit addresses sent $22.2 billion in cryptocurrency to services in 2023, a decrease from $31.5 billion in 2022, and centralized exchanges remain the primary destination.

title: From Anatomy to Auction Houses: Grant Riven Yun's $2 Million Art and Medicine Journey
description: Grant Riven Yun's career brings together the worlds of medical academia, digital art and the landscapes of his native Wisconsin.

title: Orbs Partners with SYMMIO to Grow Onchain Derivatives Landscape
description: Layer 3 blockchain infrastructure platform Orbs welcomed the partnership of SYMMIO, an over-the-counter on-chain derivatives platform in a bid to boost liquidity in the on-chain derivatives market. In a press release this Thursday, the strategic partnership between these two platforms aims to grow the measly $2 billion on-chain derivatives market, enabling traders to make use of better capital efficiency and boost overall liquidity in the space, by tapping into external liquidity markets such as Binance.

title: US Treasury Disputes Crypto Funding Allegations For Hamas
description: The US Treasury refutes claims of significant crypto funding for Hamas, clarifying that reported amounts likely misrepresented total wallet assets, as lawmakers continued using disputed data to support crypto regulations despite objections.

title: ARK Invest adjusts portfolio, sells Coinbase and Robinhood shares
description: ARK Invest, the investment firm renowned for its focus on innovation led by Cathie Wood, has significantly changed its portfolio by selling shares of major cryptocurrency-related companies. On February 14, the firm sold 214,068 shares of Coinbase (COIN) and 119,394 shares of Robinhood (HOOD) from its Exchange-Traded Funds (ETFs), marking its first major cryptocurrency-related stock […]

title: Palm Collective Gives Creators Opportunity to Showcase Work at NFT Paris Exhibition
description: New York, NY, USA, February 15th, 2024, Chainwire Palm Collective has announced details of a competition that gives artists the opportunity to have their work displayed during the upcoming NFT Paris event, which returns for its third edition on February 23 before concluding a day later. title: AI Ethics Advocates Propose Licensing and Whistleblower Channels to Prevent Post Office-style Scandals
description: In response to the notorious Post Office scandal, the British Computer Society (BCS) has put forth proactive measures to prevent similar injustices. title: OpenAI Reportedly Developing Search Engine to Challenge Google’s Dominance
description: OpenAI emerges as a formidable contender, potentially challenging Google’s supremacy in the search engine domain. title: Internet sensation KSI faces pump-and-dump allegations in crypto sphere
description: Internet sensation KSI, known for his prominent presence on YouTube, finds himself embroiled in controversy following the reopening of his old cryptocurrency-focused account.  KSI, also recognized as Olajide Olayinka Williams Olatunji, reactivated his account on the platform, which boasts approximately 371,000 followers, reigniting discussions surrounding his involvement in the crypto space. title: Telefónica Uses Chainlink on Polygon for SIM Security
description:

title: CRV Price Eyes Another Move as Curve Finance Raises Disclaimer
description:
